parameters.name: fetchQuota
parameters.description: Specifies whether to retrieve the quota information for the project.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The line from which the query starts. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. Fuzzy queries are supported.

parameters.name: resourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of rows to return on each page for a paged query. The default value is 100. A maximum of 500 projects can be returned.
